summary.span: 用户可以先添加、删除、修改和枚举 ，然后再发送到服务器。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
protected: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 属性包含一个可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: The property contains an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用属性提供的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide synchronized versions of the using the property. 同步代码必须对的执行操作 ，而不是直接在上执行操作 。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object.
